entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You can't say the Imperials are rational. Captain Jasha, at the Imperial Fort overlooking Bestine, was convinced that the Rebels where using banthas to haul goods around the planet. So you took his money and killed a number of them for him. Bantha class cargo haulers ?. Right.
entries.journal_entry_description: The Imperials are worried that the Rebels are using Banthas as transport for supplies. By using Banthas, it is more difficult for the Imperials to track Rebel smuggling operations. You are hired to kill as many Banthas as possible.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The empire has hired you to kill Banthas so the Alliance can not use them to transport supplies around Tatooine.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Good job. This should force the Rebels to start using speeders and haulers, something that it is easier for us to detect. I have credited your account.
